name: UpdateSubscriptionSettings
description:
Update subscription settings for a project.

This tool updates the settings of a subscription for a specified project in Datadog. It should be called when modifications to subscription details are needed.

parameters.name: subscription_id
parameters.description: A unique integer identifying the subscription to update.

value_schema.description: A unique integer value identifying this subscription.

parameters.name: project_id
parameters.description: The ID of the project to access. Retrieve it via /api/projects/ if unknown.

value_schema.description: Project ID of the project you're trying to access. To find the ID of the project, make a call to /api/projects/.

parameters.name: subscription_update_request_body
parameters.description: A JSON object containing the subscription update details like `id`, `dashboard`, `insight`, communication `target_type`, `target_value`, `frequency`, `interval`, `byweekday`, `bysetpos`, `count`, `start_date`, `until_date`, `created_at`, `created_by`, `deleted`, `title`, `summary`, `next_delivery_date`, and `invite_message`. This structure defines how the subscription is updated and includes settings for notifications and schedule.

metadata.description: Tools that enable LLMs to interact directly with the Datadog API.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: A unique integer value identifying this subscription.

value_schema.description: A unique integer value identifying this subscription.

parameters.name: project_id
parameters.description: Project ID of the project you're trying to access. To find the ID of the project, make a call to /api/projects/.

value_schema.description: Project ID of the project you're trying to access. To find the ID of the project, make a call to /api/projects/.
